mapper.sql: id, email, name, password, auth, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_user where email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password = password(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, email, name, password, auth, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_user
id,
email,
name,
password,
auth,
status,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth = #{auth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
